name: The Chihuahua Christmas Caper
description:
A game originally made for the secret Santa jam 2022 but not submitted in time. It was made for ThaCubers

ThaCubers three Chihuahuas were settled in on Christmas eve after playing with their owner all day, until they decided to take a look at their gifts early. They now sneak through the house trying to find their treats

Controls - 

A and D - Left and Right
Space - Jump
Q and E - Switch Characters
R - Reset Level

Sources -

All assets were made by me accept the music
Music - https://freesound.org/people/Xythe/sounds/516912/
